name: GestationalDiabetes
title: Gestational Diabetes
description: Updated in July 2021 to replace the SNOMED CT and ICD-10-CM member value sets with intensionally defined values sets. Scope, inclusion and exclusion remain the same.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains codes that represent Gestational Diabetes),(Data Element Scope: This value set contains ICD-9-CM, ICD-10-CM and SNOMED-CT codes that represent Gestational Diabetes),(Inclusion Criteria: The codes in this grouped value set represent Gestational Diabetes during pregnancy, childbirth and the puerperium. Codes include Gestational Diabetes controlled by diet, insulin, oral hypoglycemic drugs, and unspecified control.),(Exclusion Criteria: Type 1 and Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus, steroid-induced Diabetes Mellitus, codes representing conditions occurring in infants born to a mother with Gestational Diabetes.)
